name: Baked Cornish Game Hens
author: JMRYGH
summary: Cornish game hens stuffed with a vegetable mixture, then roasted. A Cornish game hen recipe that I found and tweaked a bit for the taste and size of our small family, but it would be very easy to adjust it to fit your needs.  It goes well with oven-roasted potatoes.
ingredients: 1 (4.5 ounce) can mushrooms, drained and chopped
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
In a small bowl combine the 1/2 cup melted butter, onion, celery, bell pepper, mushrooms, garlic, basil, oregano and parsley
Season hens inside and out with salt and pepper to taste, then stuff with equal amounts butter/vegetable mixture
Place stuffed birds in a 9x13 inch baking dish, breast side up
Cover dish and bake in the preheated oven for 1 1/2 hours
Remove cover and brown at 500 degrees F (260 degrees C)
